root.textElement: This is a & text element with numbers 01234567
root.elementWithCData: This is an element with CDATA; full of chars & that will be escaped <>"$'. And some more as well!!&&&&<><>><><<>><<>><<>>.
root.elementWhoseContentContainsCRLF: This is a text which contains not only characters, but also some CRLF combinations.
root.specialChars: Value with special characters: áéíóú ثجض萨么çèñð 提寺萨么特大厦喀拾 أبثجضسذل שׁשׂסּפּוֹפֿ and that's it.
